code: import React from"react";import*as dayjs from"dayjs";import{TableCell,TableBody,TableRow,Avatar}from"@windmill/react-ui";import MainModal from"../modal/MainModal";import MainDrawer from"../drawer/MainDrawer";import AdminDrawer from"../drawer/AdminDrawer";import useToggleDrawer from"../../hooks/useToggleDrawer";import EditDeleteButton from"../table/EditDeleteButton";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AdminTable=_ref=>{let{staffs}=_ref;const{title,serviceId,handleModalOpen,handleUpdate}=useToggleDrawer();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainModal,{id:serviceId,title:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainDrawer,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminDrawer,{id:serviceId})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableBody,{children:staffs===null||staffs===void 0?void 0:staffs.map(staff=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableRow,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"font-semibold uppercase text-xs",children:[" ",staff._id.substring(20,24)]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(TableCell,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm",children:staff.email})," "]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm",children:dayjs(staff.joiningData).format("MMM D, YYYY")})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-sm font-semibold",children:staff.role})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TableCell,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EditDeleteButton,{id:staff._id,title:staff.name,handleUpdate:handleUpdate,handleModalOpen:handleModalOpen})})]},staff._id))})]});};export default AdminTable;
